Description:
BE SURPRISED BEHIND THE LEAFY FACADE!
Interesting and appealing architecture, built to take advantage of the tree lined reserve, set on APP., 790 SQM of land. A generous entrance opens to the large formal lounge with separate dining, a peaceful and quiet outlook, second living has excellent kitchen with space for meals and/or living. The hallway flows to extra generous master bedroom with ensuite and WIR, remaining two have BIR'S, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Downstairs rumpus room or den provides another living (maybe home office, has direct internal access as well). Features woodfire box, timber beamed ceilings, granite benches, walk in pantry, split system, fans and more. Double garage, wide front verandah, garden shed and easterly back deck. Inspect and appreciate all that is here, middle of the village but... a bush haven.

Description:
A SHORT STROLL TO THE WATERFRONT!
Situated a mere 180 meter walk to the stunning Clifton Springs coastline with pristine swimming beaches is this fantastic home featuring 3 generous bedrooms including a Master with WIR, 2 living areas and a functional kitchen with gas cooking. This lovely home has a practical floorplan that enjoys northerly facing sun drenched formal lounge with bay window & access to the rear garden from the open plan dining/living area, making the most of an indoor/ outdoor lifestyle. Perfect for those looking to secure a part of the Bellarine Peninsula for their lifestyle, investment portfolio or holiday home with access to beaches, golf course, walking tracks and more at your doorstep.

Description:
Top Shelf!
It is very apt that this fine residence sits proudly on one of Clifton Springs most elevated sites as it is 'top shelf' in every sense of the word. Originally a custom build of the highest calibre it has now been remastered to become the ultimate Bellarine Peninsula 'lifestyle' home.
The enviable land holding of approximately 1282m2 boasts picturesque garden settings (automated watering systems), established plantations flank the boundaries to create privacy and seclusion (bay views through the tree tops) and a grand exposed aggregate circular driveway (dual cross over) with side/rear access delivers 'one of a kind' user friendly features to accommodate the cars, boats, caravans or even the jet ski!
A beautifully appointed 3 bedroom residence with high quality fixtures and fittings throughout
The master suite is complete with en-suite and generous built in robes. The second and third bedrooms form a guest wing and are serviced by a second bathroom (complete with spa bath)
A timber kitchen is simply charming and serves up a practical space; expansive bench tops, excellent storage solutions and quality fixtures
A stunning formal lounge of grand proportions boasts a northerly aspect; dual bay windows promote wonderful natural light and prime outlook over established gardens
The second living area is expansive; glass sliding door step out onto a decked entertaining space; a lovely place to take in an early coffee whilst bathed in sunshine
This home is fully equipped for those who love to entertain; a purpose built and sheltered area to the rear of the residence
The oversized garage spans 8.8m x 7.8m approx and serves up a myriad of options but just wait there is more; under-house storage as far as the eye can see gives further scope and options if you desire
Warm, welcoming and charming this property will instantly give you the 'I am home feel'; all the modern comforts and an impressive inclusions list to be discovered upon further inspection
Insights: 32-34 Dandarriga Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
SPACE FOR FAMILY, ROOM FOR TRADIE TRUCKS
Larger blocks are hard to find in our area. Looking for space around you? Then this home might be what you are looking for. Spacious family home. Home backs onto the Clifton Springs Primary School. Can't get any closer for the kids. Room for the Tradie trucks or the boys toys. Only a stoneâs throw down the road to the boat ramp if you like fishing or a walk along the water's edge overlooking Corio Bay to the You Yangs. In an established area of Clifton Springs it is close to all the amenities for work, rest and play. Enjoy eating out? Cafe's, restaurants, pubs you are spoilt for choice. Exercising is also taken care of with walking tracks, sporting organisations, dance groups and gyms again you will be spoilt for choice. Statistics state that people choose to live in areas where they can get to everything they need within a twenty minute radius. This suburb ticks a lot of boxes. Floor-plan layout allows for zoned living, separate living areas front and rear. Conversations can flow freely in the kitchen while sitting at the bench and overlooking the family area. There is a large undercover entertainment area. Many a BBQ could be held here with family and friends.
Insights: 102-104 Kewarra Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Delightful Deck Entertainer
Drive through double gates to neat gardens & plenty of exposed aggregate to park the family cars or boat or even caravan. This 3 bedroom plus study home will tick some boxes for sure. Open plan tiled living is the family hub including the kitchen with a stainless steel electric hot plate, range hood & oven. Step down to another larger living with timber like floors with a reverse cycle split-system & sliding doors out to the deck. Off to the side is the study with built in desks & shelving. Down the hall you will find 3 bedrooms all with built in robes. Central bathroom has a separate shower & small bath just right for kids. Laundry has plenty of cupboards for storage. Massive undercover deck will impress you & is the perfect entertainment zone for any function. Back yard has low maintenance gardens & a single car garage perfect for a man cave or storage shed. Plus, rear access gates you can drive into from the reserve. Additional features are privacy blinds, stylish light fittings, ceilings fans throughout plus solar panels all on a 585m2 block & just a few minutes' drive to the Clifton Springs boat ramp, the bay & stunning cliff top walks. Also close to local shops, schools, medical facilities & public transport. A must on your shopping list.

Address: 86-88 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Brilliant Bellarine Beauty
There is something a bit special about this extensive home located just moments to the waters edge. The substantial 1,207m² (approx) allotment brings a myriad of opportunities and the expansive bay views are mesmerising.
Beautifully presented and offered over three levels, upstairs features include two separate living zones and a spacious master suite with walk-in robe and en-suite. Sun filled with sea views, the lounge area will be a favourite room to spend time relaxing and taking in the vista. There is effortless connection to outdoor entertaining on a large deck with a northerly aspect. The open plan living zone is the hub of the home and it includes a generous contemporary kitchen and adjacent meals and living area.
Downstairs offers the perfect childrens retreat or accommodation for guests. Highlights here include a light filled rumpus room; three bedrooms with built-in robes; a study; family sized bathroom; two separate powder rooms; a large laundry; and plentiful storage including a purpose built storeroom.
One of the most outstanding features of this property is the vastness of its site. The double block has been lovingly landscaped and feels like a private haven. Mature trees and established easy care gardens envelope the residence. You may choose to enjoy its spaciousness just as it is, extend the footprint, or alternatively investigate a possible subdivision (STCA).
You will love the close proximity of beaches, boat ramp, reserves, private and public schools and the golf course. Geelong is a short commute away and the bounty of the Bellarine is right on the doorstep, as well as the daily ferry from Portarlington to Melbourne! Enjoy lifestyle plus location with this stylish forever home.
Insights: 86-88 Beacon Point Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Paramount Views Of The Bay And Beyond!
Boasting an impressive elevated position and featuring unsurpassed views of the bay and beyond, 47 Dandarriga Drive encapsulates all the highly sought after "must have" qualities that Clifton Springs is renowned for.
Framed by the beautifully landscaped front garden, the discerning buyer can easily visualise how much potential there is for the ability to park their boat, caravan and cars off street which is a quality that doesn't become available often.
Upon entering the home, you are immediately distracted by the views that the family room features. From the family room, the spacious kitchen is the central hub of the home featuring expansive benchtops and more than generous cupboard and storage options and featuring beautiful timber flooring throughout the family, kitchen and dining room.
An informal dining room will definitely be a talking point as it also features stunning views and leads out to a prominent balcony alfresco area that will be the envy of family and friends. Featuring 3 bedrooms with the master having an ensuite and WIR there is also the option of a ground level fourth bedroom which is currently a storage room. There is also a ground level rumpus room/workshop area leading to a two car garage.
47 Dandarriga Drive will instantly appeal and is underpinned by its highly sought after lifestyle credentials, with the vast array of award winning restaurants and wineries close by, all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for multiple shopping and schooling precincts close by and access to public transport seconds from your front door.
This beautiful home is a definite "must inspect" property to add to your list.
Insights: 47 Dandarriga Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Clifton Springs Best Value for Money!
Set at the top of the court behind a private gate the establish garden lines the path to the picturesque front entrance. Light timber boards throughout, elevated living, plenty of windows and natural light make this home an absolute delight. A very generous living area that combines into the reading nook offers subtle bay views, complete with split system heating/cooling and ceiling fan before flowing into the kitchen and dining. An updated kitchen with new cabinetry, 900mm freestanding gas Omega stove/oven and dishwasher overlooking the dining. The rear of the home hosts 3 bedrooms all with built-in robes, the master with a walk-in robe and ensuite. A main bathroom, separate toilet and laundry complete this tidy package.
The HIGHLIGHT of this home is the astounding block size, a whopping 780m2 surrounded by established gardens with plenty of room for additions and improvements, complete with a double lock up garage.
Fantastically positioned, close to public transport, schools and all your major amenities all within proximity to the Bay. The ideal first home, investment or something with just enough of a blank canvas to add your creative improvements, value for money is certainly evident with what is on offer. If you want a slice of the Bellarine's best kept secret be sure to have this home at the top of your list.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Address: 104 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Savvy, Entry Level Buying!
Your piece of the Bellarine pie is up for the taking! Options are in abundance whether you're looking for your foot in the property door with your first home, a rewarding investment, perfect downsizer or a lock up and leave holiday home, this will tick all boxes. The ultimate location, as a 15 minute stroll has you dipping your toes in at the beach, public transport on your door step and all major amenities at your fingertips.
A private picket fence with secure gates welcomes you to the established and manicured front gardens. The sense of home is immanent, as you're greeted by an open first living area. A fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher and generous walk-in-pantry overlook a meals area, which seamlessly flows onto an expansive and funky 2nd living/rumpus area. 3 bedrooms fall from the central hallway, all with built-in-robes, the master with en-suite, with this wing also comprising a central family bathroom, separate toilet and laundry with an abundance of storage and outdoor access.
The full length driveway leads to a secure double lock up carport at the rear, which allows ample room for multiple cars, caravans, boats and all toys in between to be safety stored.
Additional features include: 3 split systems, subtle Bay views, garden shed, undercover patio, low maintenance courtyard, new front security, awnings on all front windows and electric roller blinds from the 2nd living area windows.
An inspection is a must to appreciate this well-kept, low maintenance and cosy humble home.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
BRAND NEW NEAR THE WATER
Here is a rare opportunity to secure a brand new home in an established area within easy walking distance to the bayside beaches and nearby parklands. The new shopping centre is just a short drive away and further afield are the fabulous attractions of the Bellarine.
With 3 generously sized bedrooms, main with WIR, and a north facing living area and back yard you can enjoy a relaxed life by the bay in this well designed home. The living area opens out to a timber deck and landscaped garden. The family kitchen features stone benchtops, pantry, 900mm s/s cooker, and a s/s dishwasher. The living area features floorboards and carpets to the bedrooms.
There is ample storage and a large garage with remote opening with direct access to keep you and your car secure. For your comfort the 6-star home has ducted heating external wall and ceiling insulation batts, and a 6 Star Energy rating.
The home is fully landscaped with paved driveway and ready to move in and enjoy.
This home will appeal to 1st homebuyers, those looking to downsize and investors looking for an investment with depreciation benefits.
Insights: 3A Kiama Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
A Private Light-filled Haven With Stunning Courtyard Appeal
Parkland living at its finest, this modern well designed four bedroom and two bathroom home is nestled beside the landscaped Sundial Reserve.
Live the quiet life in the heart of Clifton Springs with a spectacular outlook.
This fantastic home has that charming appeal that everyone who sees it will feel at home.
The home comprises of a formal lounge or dining room with an open plan living area leading to a private undercover alfresco dining or living area.
A contemporary kitchen with dishwasher, gas cook top and range hood, a large island bench top for that added space.
The master bedroom is filled with natural sunlight serviced by a walk in wardrobe and to cap it off is an ensuite fit for royalty with a large walk in shower, toilet and vanity but also a large spa bath which looks out to the private courtyard.
A large central bathroom with shower and vanity services the remaining three bedrooms that are all spacious in size.
The home is kept comfortable all year round with ducted heating and cooling with a separate split system air conditioner for the really hot days.
Room for a boat and caravan with a large double lock up garage.
Fantastic living with a private oasis in your own back yard, 611sqm allotment gives you that space to live in comfort.
Insights: 6 Sanctuary Cove, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 73 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
A Beacon Of Shining Light!
Just when you thought it was the impossible dream; a stylish and uncompromising renovation of the highest calibre, x4 generous bedrooms, X2 bathrooms, a short walk to the water's edge and sweeping bay views AND all this at an entry level price point!
This charming and character filled residence is sure to impress!
Upon entry you will be greeted by towering cathedral ceilings, crisp neutral tones, the ambiance of a Coonara wood fire and expansive windows promote wonderful natural light
X4 bedrooms of grand proportions; master is complete with an epic custom built walk in robe and the luxurious ensuite is eye catching.
The primary living zone consists of a kitchen/family/meals area. The kitchen is brand new and is complete with expansive bench tops, excellent storage solutions, all new appliances and water views through the lush green tree tops.
Only being a short walk to the waters edge this home have been cleverly designed to embrace the wonderful Bellarine Peninsula lifestyle; generous off street parking is secured by an automated gate and provides room enough for the cars, boat, caravan and even the jet ski. An additional utility shed provides further conveniences.
The family/pet friendly yard is secured by a perimeter fence, tastefully landscaped and an expansive sheltered alfresco ensures this home is ticking all the boxes
All the modern comforts and many more fine features to be discovered on further inspection!
Insights: 73 Beacon Point Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
SPACIOUS AND MODERN HOME
Featuring a modern design and functional floorplan with three living zones and four bedrooms including Master with ensuite, this home offers an abundance of space and privacy for the growing family. Situated in the thriving seaside town of Clifton Springs on approx 630m2 parcel of land with Golf Course, Bowls Club and pristine beaches all in close proximity, this home offers easy low maintenance living allowing you more time to enjoy the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula with excellent schools, award winning wineries and fantastic fishing all on offer! This fabulous home further comprises ducted heating and split system plus new blinds and carpets leaving you nothing more to do but move in, or alternatively a fantastic investment opportunity.

Address: 67 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
BAY VIEWS AND SUNSETS!
Style, space and functionality all combine to create this amazing property boasting panoramic views across the bay and Geelong City skyline.
The home comprises 4 bedrooms, master suite, open plan living area plus rumpus/games room, spacious kitchen, and sunny covered balcony ideal for entertaining.
Outstanding features including polished concrete and solid timber flooring, granite bench tops, glass splash-backs, ducted evaporative cooling, ducted heating and DLUG.
Stunning design coupled with a spectacular 'Million Dollar View', this home is the ideal family residence.

Address: 153 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Great backyard, great house, great location
There is a certain charm as you pull up to this recently renovated 3 bedroom family home offering a separate spacious light filled living room. The open plan kitchen & dining area exudes a casual warmth & is bound to be the social hub of the home.
Master bedroom with a modern ensuite including a frameless, doorless tiled shower.
The second & third bedrooms located in a separate passageway serviced by the central bathroom .
In floor central heating.
Split system heating/cooling.
Carport sheltering the entryway.
Barn door style 10m x 5m colourbond garage with 3 phase, motion sensor alarm, perfect for the tradies.
Backyard is fully landscaped with low maintenance trees and shrubs.
Set on a generous allotment, approx. 839 sqm and just minutes to the picturesque Clifton Springs Golf Course safe boat harbour, schools, transport and excellent shopping centres.

Description:
Desirable Corner Block
Classic corner loved 3-bedroom family home on a fantastic 581m2 block. Lounge has air conditioning, gas heater & ceiling fan with street views. Flowing onto the dining & kitchen area with a northern facing window plus a dishwasher & an electric stove. Down the hall are the 3 bedrooms & 2 have built in robes. Serviced by a central bathroom with a new single vanity basin & shower. Double linen off the laundry which has access out to the undercover pergola. Large yard has a garden shed, double car lock up garage, plus side access double gates perfect to store a large boat or caravan. Just a short drive to the Dell, Golf & Bowls club, boat ramp, local schools, shopping centre, medical facilities & local schools. Plus everything the Bellarine has to offer you such as beaches, ferry services & local wineries. Buy or invest today, Clifton Springs awaits you!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Stellar Starter, Ideal Investment!
Oozing with charm, this bay side abode offers more than meets the eye. Perfectly positioned in a private tucked away pocket and only an 8-minute stroll to the boat ramp and water's edge, this is your opportunity to secure your piece of paradise!
The perfect start for first home buyers, a low maintenance investment or holiday home, a multitude of opportunities are on offer. Perfect as is, but with room for you to add your own mark, your imagination will run wild! First impressions count, as established ornamental pears line the front garden, which also offers a high fence and secure front gates. Upon entry to the home, you're greeted by a separate lounge area, which flows into the main hub of the home, equipped with 2nd living, spacious kitchen with 900ml 5 burner gas cooking, dishwasher and storage, all while overlooking the meals area with split system heating and cooling. A versatile 4th bedroom/study complete the fore of the home, before 3 spacious bedrooms, 2 with built-in-robes sit from the central rear wing, this area complete with the fully equipped bathroom, separate toilet and laundry.
A serene and tranquil feel, the back garden offers an expansive undercover deck which lead you down to an open grassed area with more than enough open space for children and pets alike! With an array of storage options for all the toys, a double car port leads you through to the rear DLUG, with plenty of space for multiple cars, the boat, caravan and anything imaginable!
Location is key and this package offers it all! The boat ramp, golf club, shops, public transport, kindergarten and primary school are all within a short walk, with all further major amenities at your fingertips. Don't miss this opportunity!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
PRIME LIFESTYLE POSITION
Located only a few minutes from the water and local golf club precinct with public transport nearby. Pop in to the various wineries and cafes located only a short drive away or jump on the Port Phillip Ferry for a day in the city. This lovely home was constructed by the current vendors and has been meticulously maintained. This is a walkin and unpack all complete package !
Attention to detail can be observed throughout this outstanding four bedroom, two bathroom home. Spotless floor coverings, modern tonings, renovated modern kitchen with stone bench tops and quality European appliances, top quality window furnishings and much more. Central heating and cooling throughout the home for your comfort.
Beautiful timber shutters control abundant light filtering into the home.
Picture perfect gardens manicured to perfection surround the property creating a tranquil outdoor area where the sound of the trickling water can be heard as you relax by the barbecue.
The double garage plus undercover for one more gives plenty of parking options.
Water tanks 2 x 4500lts & 1 x 2270 lts for wc , 3kW Solar Panels
Private inspections only

Description:
Peaceful Court Location
A solid brick home with three bedrooms and two bathrooms with fantastic views awaits in this pristine peaceful court .
On a large allotment of approx 585 sqm sits this well maintained home with many features that will appeal to all that inspect it.
Fully tinted windows to keep the heat and cooling costs to a minimum.
Carpeted bedrooms with built in robes.
Master bedroom with ensuite.
Spacious dining area filled with natural sunlight.
Impressive kitchen with 900mm gas cook top with range hood and wall oven surrounded by a large island bench top.
A new Fujitsu ducted heating and cooling system.
This fabulous family home has a large under covered Merbau deck to enjoy your BBQ or just chill out with family and friends.
Good side access allows plenty of space for a boat or caravan that leads onto a double garage.
Down stairs hideaway idea for a theatre music or storage if needed.

Description:
Solid home with potential views in need of a makeover.
This home has a solid foundation and is a great blank canvas waiting for someone to make it their own.
In a private court with snippets of views to the bay, the large allotment is in a quiet location. A second storey would provide commanding views of Corio bay and the You Yangs.
The home provides a functional layout that comprises 3 bedrooms, 3 living zones, 2 bathrooms, separate laundry and an undercover entertaining area. A large master bedroom is zoned at the front of the home and includes an ensuite and walk in robe.
The kitchen is open plan to the dining/living with gas cooking, plenty of storage and breakfast bar. A formal living space is at the front of the home, whilst a rumpus room is located at the rear of the home.
Slate tiles floor the main living zones, whilst the living and bedroom carpet has been removed ready for new flooring.
An undercover alfresco area opens out from the central dining / living area and looks out to the North toward the bay and over the large rear yard, whilst a single carport and storage shed complete the home.
If you are looking for a project home that just needs an aesthetic makeover and some TLC, it doesn't get more affordable than this.
Call Dion Plumb for more information on 0424 940 629
Insights: 6 Ningana Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Contemporary Coastal Vibe
This two-storey brick home, situated on a generous 702m² (approx), has been tastefully renovated and boasts a contemporary yet relaxed coastal aesthetic. Upstairs the harbour views are captivating and the open plan living area is spacious and light filled. The adjacent kitchen offers plentiful work and storage space and is perfectly suited to cater for everyday living and entertaining. The rumpus room provides added living space and is all about soaking up the sunshine and views. A master suite, with walk in robe and en-suite, feels like a parents haven and the adjacent study offers a handy space to work from home if required.
Downstairs takes care of the kids or guests with four generous bedrooms and a family sized bathroom with double vanity. Spread out and relax in the second living zone or out in the sunroom, which comes complete with a wet bar and easy flow to the private and fenced garden. Extra storage is always a bonus and this property has plenty of that inside and out with a freestanding double garage and garden shed too.
This magical location is becomingly increasingly well known as a peaceful corner of the Bellarine that enjoys easy access to safe swimming and ocean beaches, nature filled reserves, wineries, golf courses and spectacular scenery. Just a short commute to Geelong, the cafes and boutique shopping of nearby coastal hot spots are within easy reach too. With all the hard work done here there will be plenty of time to enjoy it all.
Insights: 16 Gwinganna Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 4 other 5 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.
